name: Jet Cadets
description:
Jet Cadets is a 2 player jetpacking fireman water blasting game! Fill up the jug at the bottom of the screen to maximum capacity. The player who has the most liquid in the jug by the time it fills wins!

Controls:
- Left joystick to move/jetpack around
- Right joystick to aim/shoot water

Requires Controllers to play

Team:
Whitaker Trebella
Ricky Roberson
Dustin Peerce
David Laskey
Logan Hayes
